entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with snow in the afternoon. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to snow late in the evening. Fog patches dissipating late in the evening. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
